name: Kool Savas
description:
'''Savaş Yurderi''' (born 10 February 1975), known by his stage name '''Kool Savas''', is a German [[Rapping|rapper]]. Along with [[Taktlo$$]], he formed the highly influential German rap duo Westberlin Maskulin (1997–2000). He was also a founding member of the German rap crew Masters of Rap in 1996. Savas is considered one of the most successful German rappers.

In 2012, he collaborated in "Xavas", a duo formation with [[Xavier Naidoo]], a German [[Soul music|soul]] and [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] singer-songwriter and actor in the album ''Gespaltene Persönlichkeit''. The two had already worked together on a number of other releases.
